title: We’re expanding and seeking a Remote Google Ads & Meta Ads Account Manager with strong performance marketing skills.
job_overview:
We’re expanding and seeking a Remote Google Ads & Meta Ads Account Manager with strong performance marketing skills.
Send your CV: Upgrade to see actual info

Salary: $3000 - $5000/month depending on results

Role:

Develop and manage advertising campaigns.

Analyze and report campaign performance regularly.

Optimize strategies for best outcomes.

Requirements:

Minimum 1 year running Google or Facebook Ads.

KPI-focused mindset.

Remote working discipline.
